title: Julio To The Buccaneers
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss what stories they’re interested in from this offseason, the “Independent study” requirement for Kyler Murray’s contract, Deshaun Watson’s start of training camp, Tyreek Hill’s comments on Tua and Julio Jones signing with the Buccaneers on a one year deal. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Kyler Murray's "independent study" and Julio Jones to the Buccaneers.
